verbs.description: [ARG1: arrest] [V: made] [ARGM-TMP: after buyer of street drugs] dies a mount vernon man was arrested thursday on charges of controlled substance homicide after a man who thought he was buying percocet instead received pills laced with the powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl mexico mary kellar scientist oxycodone seattle john mendieta county of brant arrest mount vernon prosecutor reporter u s keith weis heroin wash mark strongman mount vernon police department skagit county washington state patrol crime lab china special agent in charge dea rosemary kaholokula graham johnson
